data.text: Hallelujah!112:1 Or Hallelu YAH, meaning Praise the LORD. This psalm is an acrostic poem, each line beginning with the successive letters of the Hebrew alphabet.
His descendants will be mighty in the land;
Wealth and riches are in his house,
Light dawns in the darkness for the uprightâ€”
It is well with the man who is generous and lends freely,
Surely he will never be shaken;
He does not fear bad news;
His heart is assured; he does not fear,
He has scattered abroad his gifts to the poor;
The wicked man will see and be grieved;
